name: Cartoon Antics
description:
This is a fun game. When you come here, you carry a gun with you. There are a lot of gold coins floating in the sky. Control the direction, try to jump and get more gold coins! Of course, while getting gold coins, there are many small traps around, so pay attention to avoid them. If you use the weapons in hand, you can eliminate them in advance.







Operation mode



Right click the target



WASD motion control



Left mouse button attack



Mouse control direction



E loading weapons
